name: Spade
headline: Enriched transaction data you can build on
description: Spade is the next generation of fintech infrastructure. We’re building a financial data enrichment API purpose built to empower our customers to uncover the truth hidden within their transaction data. We use our vast, ground-truth merchant data set to decipher cryptic transactions, helping customers underwrite, detect fraud, build better banking infrastructure and get a unique understanding of their users’ spending habits.

founders.name: Oban MacTavish, Founder
founders.description: Oban MacTavish is the CEO of Spade. Before starting Spade Oban co-founded Hubly - a vertical SaaS platform for independent RIAs.

Learn More
# Real-time merchant intelligence for the card ecosystem
Spade’s API provides granular merchant, category, and geolocation details, using ground truth—not guesswork—to deliver exceptionally accurate results in real time.
Learn More
Trusted by customers processing $100B+ in payments each year
[![stripe logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/stripe.5e045527c69c50221784d1e26d9c02a8.svg)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/stripe.com/>)
[![corpay logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/corpay.b56a9f1441a4f34c2f0b441fcf9bd57d.svg)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/www.corpay.com/>)
[![unit logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/unit.9ee53a7a1fdace89cdcc.png)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/www.unit.co/>)
[![mercury logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/mercury.95b0c369b422386e229eb17227d1bca2.svg)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/mercury.com/>)
[![relay logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/relay.62e3149f070434bfd5efc92ce397bc1b.svg)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/relayfi.com/>)
[![sardine logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/sardine.53aa330ded5f19228d7fc8ba13c78fe5.svg)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/www.sardine.ai/>)
[![atelio logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/atelio.764440ce1c733c0affe3680f2f2a6d77.svg)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/atelio.com/>)
[![coast logo](https://www.spade.com)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/coastpay.com/>)
[![fuelman logo](https://www.spade.com/static/media/fuelman.2694cc9ec19b6599f9d8.png)](https://www.spade.com/<https:/www.fuelman.com/>)
## How Spade works
  * 1.
You send Spade the transaction data you’ve generated or received from an outside source.
  * 2.
Spade’s API takes that data and maps it to a real merchant identity, assigning correct spending categories, geolocation details, and many additional, proprietary fields.
  * 3.
Spade returns cleaner, richer, more actionable data to your platform in a matter of milliseconds.


![placeholder](https://www.spade.com/static/media/RealData@2x.f3de673457bcf4797581.png)
### Realdata
Leverage a ground-truth data network that matches transactions to actual merchant identities, instead of relying on scraping and speculation.
![placeholder](https://www.spade.com/static/media/BroaderCoverage@2x.1578216d8c7533877e52.png)
### Broader coverage
Get complete, standardized data for >99.9% of merchants in the U.S., from nationwide chains to small local shops.
![placeholder](https://www.spade.com/static/media/DeeperInsight@2x.cddf4e01b67d07abfef3.png)
### Deeper insights
Go beyond MCC and NAICs codes to precise spend categories and geographic coordinates, plus additional fields like logo, website, business hours, and customer spending histories.
![placeholder](https://www.spade.com/static/media/RealTimeResponse@2x.943f24c43fefae3f1ca1.png)
### Real-timeresponse
Have your transaction data processed, enhanced, and returned in under 50ms—well within card authorization windows and much faster than other enrichment engines.
![placeholder](https://www.spade.com/static/media/EasyImplementation@2x.7fee5b5f32f457ef746e.png)
### Easyimplementation
Get up and running quickly with a simple, turnkey integration that can be completed in under an hour.
![placeholder](https://www.spade.com/static/media/SecureSolutions@2x.2555ced41f02753a9e4f.png)
### Secure solutions
Partner with a SOC 2-certified company backed by seasoned investors and a team of experienced industry experts.
## Purpose-builttransactionenrichmentsolutions
[Learn More](https://www.spade.com/</solutions>)
![Enhance real-time authorization](https://www.spade.com/static/media/banking.427122bba7ef2c36c8c2.png)
### Enhance real-time authorization
Spade returns clean, enriched data faster, so you can improve your real-time authorization capabilities, implement granular spend controls, and optimize your user experience.
![Understand your customers.](https://www.spade.com/static/media/customer.f33425aa941a64358773.png)
### Understand your customers
Spade provides greater visibility into customer spending, allowing you to build tailored customer experiences that boost engagement and lifetime value.
![Stop fraud in its tracks.](https://www.spade.com/static/media/fraud.0eb93da6a75c24f4e26d.png)
### Stop fraud in its tracks
With Spade’s exact geographic data, categorizations, and merchant details, you can advance your fraud detection models, monitor transactions more effectively, and shut down suspicious purchases.
![Lend with confidence.](https://www.spade.com/static/media/underwriting.16885e067eda75987d75.png)
### Leverage fraud insights
Use Spade's merchant insights to detect and prevent transactions stemming from potentially risky merchants to protect customers, reduce chargebacks, and more.
## Developer-focused
Spade’s API works out of the box with no complex setup or configuration.
![](https://www.spade.com/static/media/PlatformAgnostic@2x.537f262c0b0ccc21529a.png)
Issuer / processor agnostic
![](https://www.spade.com/static/media/QuickIntegration@2x.15a71fef692aa998bb30.png)
Integrate in under an hour
[Read The Docs](https://www.spade.com/<https:/docs.spade.com/>)
![](https://www.spade.com/static/media/DeveloperFocused.8f91b68bbab27e33ede6.png)
## Our investors
[Flourish ](https://www.spade.com/<https:/flourishventures.com/>)[a16z ](https://www.spade.com/<https:/a16z.com/>)[Gradient ](https://www.spade.com/<https:/www.gradient.com/>)[Y Combinator ](https://www.spade.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)[Dash Fund ](https://www.spade.com/<https:/dashfund.co/>)
Learn More
##### Connect

##### Follow Us

##### Legal & Security

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Spade**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch W22, Spade is a groundbreaking fintech company based in New York. With a nimble team of 13 employees, Spade is on a mission to transform transaction data into actionable insights through its cutting-edge financial data enrichment API.

**Mission and Vision**

The core mission of Spade is to supply enriched transaction data that empowers businesses to make informed decisions. By leveraging a vast, ground-truth merchant dataset, the company helps clients decode tricky transaction descriptions. This not only aids in underwriting and fraud detection but also contributes to constructing a more robust banking infrastructure. In essence, Spade seeks to unveil the hidden truths behind spending habits, providing deep insights that can drive better financial strategies.

**Key Offerings**

Spade’s API offers real-time merchant intelligence, delivering granular details about transactions that can categorize and pinpoint merchant locations accurately. Here’s how their process works:

1. **Data Submission**: Clients send their transaction data to Spade.
2. **Data Enrichment**: The API matches this data with actual merchant identities and classifies it into relevant categories with geolocation specifics.
3. **Fast Returns**: Enhanced and actionable data is returned in mere milliseconds, which is critical for businesses needing quick data processing, especially during card authorizations.

With coverage surpassing 99.9% of U.S. merchants, Spade ensures comprehensive data reliability and accuracy, going beyond traditional codes to identify precise spending patterns and merchant details.

**Why Spade Stands Out**

- **Real-Time Processing**: Transactions are processed in under 50 milliseconds, enhancing speed and efficiency.
- **Ease of Integration**: Developers can set up the solution quickly, sometimes in less than an hour, thanks to its straightforward API architecture.
- **Security**: Spade operates as a SOC 2-certified entity, ensuring the protection of client data amidst robust security practices.

**Trusted Partners**

Spade’s technology is already trusted by customers processing over $100 billion in payments annually. Companies like Stripe, Unit, Mercury, and others leverage its services to enhance their financial operations. 

**Investors and Development Focus**

Backed by prominent investors such as a16z, Flourish Ventures, and Y Combinator, Spade’s financial foundation is solid. The company is heavily developer-focused, emphasizing simplicity and efficiency in its offerings, making it adaptable across various fintech applications.

**Conclusion**

As Spade continues to grow, it stands poised to redefine how businesses understand and utilize transaction data. With an emphasis on precision, speed, and security, Spade is not just another fintech player; it's a pioneer in enriching the way transactions are interpreted and leveraged. 

For more information, check out their [website](https://www.spade.com).
